pageProduct.name: Aveeno Baby Dermexa Wash 236ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Baby Dermexa Wash 236mL

Aveeno has harnessed the soothing power of oatmeal in this ultra-gentle wash to help care for your baby's delicate sensitive skin. Developed with US leading dermatologists, this unique baby wash formula combines soothing oat essence and natural colloidal oatmeal with rich emollients to moisturise and soothe extra dry, irritated skin. The creamy bath wash is formulated to gently cleanse without drying skin. This soap free body wash is mild enough for delicate baby skin and suitable for eczema prone skin.

 - Ultra gentle formula that cleanses without drying
- Clinically proven suitable for eczema prone skin
- No added parabens or phthalates
- Fragrance free 
- pH balanced
- Hypoallergenic
- Soap free

Aveeno Baby is a US Paediatrician Recommended Brand and a proud supporter of the Eczema Association Australasia.



Suitable For: Eczema prone skin.

Size: 236mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1064 days

KEY FEATURES

• Dermexa Colloidal Oatmeal & Soothing Oat Essence
• Suitable for Eczema Prone Skin
• 236mL

Warnings

Warning: For external use only. When using this product: Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help right away.

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water, Sodium Trideceth Sulfate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Sodium Chloride, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Laureth-2, Citric Acid, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Ceramide NP, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract.

Directions

Directions for use: Dispense directly into bath water. Or dispense onto a wet washcloth or hand and apply to body. Lather and rinse.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

STORAGE CONDITION: Store at room temperature. Keep away from direct sunlight.
